resources.string: Natu, a visually stunning and emotionally resonant film, captivated audiences and critics alike with its powerful storytelling and breathtaking cinematography. With its poignant exploration of themes such as love, loss, and cultural identity, Natu has become a cinematic masterpiece. At the 95th Academy Awards, Natu made history by winning multiple Oscars, including Best Picture, Best Director, and Best Cinematography, cementing its place in the pantheon of great films.
